scenario_text.value:
♪ Let these bonds be refashioned...
♪ Never to break apart again...

♪ Take my body, together we’ll be...
♪ Let your light shine down on me...
Oooooohhh!!!
All right! It’s working!
Yeah!
Oh no! Takuma, look!

Yes, it’s working all right... Hm? Wait,
something’s wrong!

This isn’t right! Takuma, look closer! We
need to watch out!
Oh yeah! It’s working great! Hm? Wait...
Oh no! Takuma, look! Something’s wrong!

Yes, it’s working like a charm... Wait,
Takuma, look out!
It’s not working after all! Look at that!
Graaawr?
Grrraaawwwrrr!

Yes, it does seem to be working... Wait,
something’s wrong!
What’s that?! Takuma, watch out!

Takuma, you should be careful. It does appear
to be working, but...
Wait, no! Takuma, look at that!
Of course it is. Anyone can see tha—?!
Wait! Something’s not right!

Yes, it looks that way, but we shouldn’t let
our guard down just yet.
Wait, that’s... No! How could this happen?

Yes, that was certainly effective. I just
hope it was enough to finish him.
Wait! Takuma, look at that!

Yes, that seems beyond doubt. But apparently
our work here is not yet done.
Wait, what’s that?! Takuma, look!

Indeed. That was quite effective, if a little
lacking in terms of the finishing touch.

Hmph... Looks like this isn’t going to be so
easy.

Yes, that was highly effective. However, it
seems our foe is not so easily felled.

No, wait... Takuma, don’t take your eyes off
him!
Ahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh!!!
Is it...over?
I...I think so.
You will pay...
Huh...?
What was that? I heard someone just now.
Who’s there?!

All you who would try and stop me... I will
make you pay...
Saki?!
Yeah, I hear it too.
Aren’t we the only ones here right now?
Curse you... Curse you all!!!
Who is that?!
It couldn’t be...
Curse you fools...who would stand in my way.
Are you...Haruchika?
Yes. I am Haruchika.

Well, we defeated the Master! And now that
he’s done for, so is your revenge!
Heheheh... Fool...

The Master was but the law of this land.
I still have the strength to fight.

My other half, bound to destruction, come
forth! Huanglongmon, to me!
What is that thing?!

This will not be! I will not let this end so
easily! Our battle is far from over!!!

So close... I am so close! So close to seeing
my wish fulfilled!!!

I will do anything I can to make that happen!
I will even become a demon! A destroyer!

Wow, just look at him! Do we even stand
a chance against that thing?

That is horrific! You’re telling me we need
to beat that? How?!
Yyyeah...

Heheh! The bigger they are, the harder they
fall!
What’s all this wind?!

Bwahahahaha! This is my chance! The door
between worlds appears before me at last!!!

The time has come!!! Ah, how I remember this
wind... I will travel through the door!

Oh no! Miyuki! Haruchika’s going to get into
our world!

No... It’s okay. Trust me... Please, Takuma,
hold him back just a little longer!
Urngh! Hear that, Agumon?!
Sure did! You’re not going anywhere!!!
Urngh! Hear that, Greymon?!
You bet I did! I’ll stop him in his tracks!!!
Urngh! Hear that, Tyranomon?!
Yeah! Leave it to me!!!
Urngh! Hear that, Tuskmon?!
You know I did! Let’s do this!
Urngh! Hear that, SkullGreymon?!
Gwaar... Grrraaawwwrrr!!!
Urngh! Hear that, MetalGreymon?!
I sure did! You can count on me!!!
Urngh! Hear that, Triceramon?!
Every word! He won’t get past me!
Urngh! Hear that, Megadramon?!
Yeah! Don’t worry, I’ll stop him!
Urngh! Hear that, WarGreymon?!
Yeah! No problem! Trust in my strength!
Urngh! Hear that, Dinorexmon?!

Absolutely! I’ll make sure he doesn’t go
anywhere!
Urngh! Hear that, Mugendramon?!
Loud and clear! Leave it to me!
Urngh! Hear that, Huanglongmon?!

Yes. Your wish could not be clearer, and
I will not fail to grant it!
Urngh! Hear that, Omegamon?!

Yes, I certainly did, and I will use all my
power to stop him!
Dracumon, you got this?!
Yeah, I’m on it!
Let’s finish this!
Kew! Kewkew!
Labramon, let’s do this!
Right!
Don’t worry, Miu! I’m here for you!
Yeah! You got this!
Time for us to show off, Floramon!
Yeah! Let’s end this!

Now’s our time to shine! If we win this,
we’re heroes for real!
You said it, Minoru!
You got this, Lopmon?

Yeah... I may be scared, but...with you,
Shuuji, I just know I can do this!
All right, time for the last battle!
Yeah!

You pathetic beasts! You are less than
worms!!!
